name: Vladislav.
aboutMeDescription: I'm a student at the International University of Information Technologies. Currently, due to the tight schedule of studies at the university, I can't work. However, I want to develop my Web developer skills and upgrade my qualifications in the future.
skillsDescription: For me, the skills I have already acquired do not mean that you can stop there. I strive to move forward. For several years I have been studying HTML, CSS and C# on my own. At uni, I got acquainted with the development of React web applications, the Python language and working with the PostgreSQL database. In the future, I would like to delve into further study of various programming languages to broaden my horizons and professional opportunities in order to be as flexible as possible in my field and, if necessary, I was ready for an abrupt change of activity.
serviceManagerSubtitle: Limited Liability Partnership 'White Wind KZ' · Full day · Kazakhstan, Almaty city
serviceManagerDescription: During my work at 'White Wind KZ' LLP, I gained very valuable experience, acquired a lot of new skills, and improved the level of previously acquired ones. These include: Working with clients, working in 1C, working in the organization's database, working in the Bitrix corporate portal, initial inspection of equipment, accepting and issuing devices, calling clients, training interns and their further supervision.
serviceEngineerSubtitle: Individual Entrepreneur 'Apple Repair' · Full day · Kazakhstan, Almaty city, Auezovsky district, 6th microdistrict, 5a
serviceEngineerDescription: Working with clients, servicing and repairing digital devices, on-site repairs, sales and etc.
universityTitle: International University of Information Technologies (IITU) · Full-time education
universityDescription: Average score: 3.7 (based on the results of the first year)
collegeTitle: Innovative Technical College of Almaty (INTC) · Full-time education
collegeDescription: Average score: 4.9 (five-point grading system). Diploma with honors (red) at the end of graduation.
projectSubtitle: 3D game based on Unity (diploma project from INTC)
contactDescription: If you are interested in working with me or have a proposal for a potential project, please feel free to contact me by email.
